Know more. Guess less.
Boost productivity.

Know more about the vessels you manage. Understand quickly and act more efficiently. Get answers without having to jump between different applications. Go from a high-level view down to the detail in just a few seconds.

Get started with Voyager Fleet Insight

Improve decision making

Track key KPIs more easily

Keep track of vessel and fleet performance including PSC inspections, navigation spend, nautical miles sailed, percentage sailing time and port calls to spot trends and improve budgeting.

Go back in time and resolve issues faster

Resolve disputes and understand incidents quickly with a detailed view of historic vessel movements combined with chart, MARPOL and other key maritime data.

Safe & compliant

Manage navigation compliance more effectively

Avoid Port State Control (PSC) and vetting issues with an up to date view of vessel inventories and compliance requirements. Use PSC Inspections data to track compliance performance and prepare for port arrival.

Improve productivity

Enable mobile ship management

Keep track of your vessels anywhere, anytime and on any device with VFI Go. Accelerate productivity with the most up-to-date information always in hand.

Control purchasing

View vessel orders overlaid on the vessel’s intended route to identify purchasing errors and reduce unnecessary spending. Get email alerts when vessels orders navigation supplies to check and approve. Streamline navigation with digital permits instantly sent to vessels and paper supplies delivered to your agreed schedule.

Lower costs

Spend less on navigation

Spot overspending and drive down your overall cost of navigation with a completely transparent view of your navigational purchasing online.

Work more efficiently with the information you need at your fingertips

View live vessel positions on C-MAP charts, overlay weather, MARPOL zones and other nearby vessels. Enhance your experience further with AVCS Online and Risk Intelligence.

Optional module

The companies in the Voyager Worldwide Group have been serving the world’s shipping industry for more than 2 centuries. We are defined not only by our leaders, products, technologies and service, but also by our values that ensure that we deliver the best possible service to our customers across the shipping industry worldwide.

Track vessels, manage compliance, view historic trading and reduce your cost of navigation

Request free trial

Export your data your way

Leverage pre-built report templates or design your own using Voyager's 150 data fields. Export reports as PDF or in excel for further analysis and use in other ship management systems.

Learn more

A fully searchable global database

Get a global view of the world fleet to view trading and compliance histories of vessel worldwide and identify and address any issues ahead of taking new ships into management.
